strengths: Council Patronage — replenish commodities at start of strategy phase, then gain 1 trade good
Law's Order — spend 1 influence to treat all laws as blank until end of turn
Choose home system from Mentak, Xxcha, or Argent Flight (unplayed faction)
Double production — resolve an additional Production ability in any system
Neighbors with all players adjacent to Mecatol Rex — diplomatic reach
Custodia Vigilia legendary planet prevents elimination
weaknesses: Dependent on which sub-faction home system you choose
Strategy varies wildly based on Mentak/Xxcha/Argent choice
Late tech selection (after all other players) can be a disadvantage
tips: Choose sub-faction based on table composition and available home systems
Council Patronage provides consistent economy — you always get commodities + 1 trade good
Law's Order is powerful during Agenda phase — ignore laws when they hurt you
Double production ability is a significant economy boost — use it every turn
You select starting tech AFTER all other players — use this information advantage
Custodia Vigilia makes you very hard to eliminate — play aggressively when you control it
Your Mecatol Rex adjacency gives unique diplomatic positioning

techPaths.name: Depends on sub-faction
techPaths.note: Tech path depends on whether you chose Mentak, Xxcha, or Argent home system. Adapt to starting tech selection.
